trigger: For induction of transcription factors and cytokines , PBMC were cultured in a volume of 4 ml in sterile pyrogen-free 6-well culture plates ( Falcon , Heidelberg , Germany ) .

Cultures were stimulated for 1 h ( EMSA ) or from 0 h to 48 h ( ELISA ) with 1 or 100 mug per 106 cells of GP , with 250 ng / 106 cells <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Toxin Technologies , Sarasota , FL , USA ) or with 250 ng / 106 cells wild-type LPS from Escherichia coli serotype 0111 : B4 ( Sigma , Munich , Germany ) .
In costimulatory experiments , PBMC were supplemented simultaneously with a combination of GP and <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or with a combination of GP and LPS .
